name: The Heater
description:
My first game. 

It was made for the 2 day game dev contest. The theme of the contest was "again and again". So i tried to create an abandoned planet where our character trying to survive from the cold.

He can catch garbage and heat(left mouse button click) cold(blue) platforms. But some big garbage pieces can destroy platforms.  

I'm open for your feedback, please write all that you think about the game, i really appreciate this.
